alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rooks and Phillips Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Agra to near Stockton to near Damar. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kirwin around 635 PM CDT. Agra around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Glade, Speed, Phillipsburg and Logan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas.
